text: Upshot is that whilst we still don't know quite how long the UK's Brexit extension will be, it's now definite that Stormont's "frozen" period will be extended by 5 months to late August

text: . @moneillsf claims NIO decision reflects fact Brexit and political survival based on reliance on @duponline are priorities for UK government

text: . @moneillsf says Karen Bradley confirmed she intends "to extend by 5 months the legislation she introduced last year as her supposed plan to restore the institutions" Law suspends requirement to call fresh Assembly elections & was due to lapse next week http://www.legislation.gov.uk/ukpga/2018/28/enacted/data.htm …
author: markdevenport
